sentences.english: I still haven’t finished painting the spare room.
sentences.chinese: 我还没粉刷完那间空房间。

sentences.english: Do you still have Julie’s phone number?
sentences.chinese: 你还留着朱莉的电话号码吗？

detailed_translations.english: up to a particular point in time and continuing at that moment

detailed_translations.chinese: 静止的，不动的；寂静的，平静的；不起泡的
detailed_translations.english: not moving
a photograph of a scene from a film

detailed_translations.chinese: 蒸馏；使…静止；使…平静下来

sentences.english: the US space program
sentences.chinese: 美国太空计划

detailed_translations.english: a series of actions which are designed to achieve something important

sentences.english: Lady Spencer
sentences.chinese: 斯宾塞夫人

sentences.english: the lords and ladies of the court
sentences.chinese: 宫廷的贵族及夫人

detailed_translations.english: used as the title of the wife or daughter of a British noblemanor the wife of a knight

sentences.english: Learning goes on throughout life.
sentences.chinese: 学习是一生的事。

sentences.english: You have your whole life ahead of you.
sentences.chinese: 你前面还有漫长的人生呢。

sentences.english: I’ve known John all my life (= since I was born ).
sentences.chinese: 我从小就认识约翰了。

sentences.english: His main aim in life was to have fun.
sentences.chinese: 他人生的主要目标就是享乐。

sentences.english: It was one of the best days of my life.
sentences.chinese: 那是我一生中最快乐的时光之一。

sentences.english: The accident scarred him for life (= for the rest of his life ).
sentences.chinese: 这场事故给他留下了终生的创伤。

sentences.english: She knew she’d feel guilty for the rest of her life.
sentences.chinese: 她知道自己将内疚终生。

sentences.english: Raj spent his life caring for others.
sentences.chinese: 拉杰一辈子都在关爱他人。

sentences.english: Bonington spent his entire adult life in France.
sentences.chinese: 博宁顿成年后就一直在法国生活。

sentences.english: We don’t know much about the poet’s early life (= when he was young ).
sentences.chinese: 我们对这位诗人的早年生活所知甚少。

sentences.english: Poor diet can lead to a whole range of diseases in later life (= when you are older ).
sentences.chinese: 饮食不良会在晚年引发各种疾病。

sentences.english: She married late in life (= when she was fairly old ).
sentences.chinese: 她结婚晚。

sentences.english: He’s a life member (= continuing until he dies ) of the club.
sentences.chinese: 他是俱乐部的终身会员。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time when someone is alive

sentences.english: The place looks completely different now.
sentences.chinese: 这地方现在完全变了。

sentences.english: They decided to try a radically different approach.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定尝试一种全然不同的办法。

sentences.english: We found women had significantly different political views from men.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现女性的政治观点与男性大不相同。

sentences.english: a slightly different way of doing things
sentences.chinese: 稍有区别的做事方法

sentences.english: What actually happened was subtly different from the PR people’s version.
sentences.chinese: 实际情况与公关部那些人的说法有细微的差别。

sentences.english: The show is refreshingly different from most exhibitions of modern art.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览与大多数现代艺术展不一样，令人耳目一新。

sentences.english: The publishing business is no different from any other business in this respect.
sentences.chinese: 从这一点来讲，出版业和其他任何行业没有什么差别。

sentences.english: It’s a different world here in London.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦这儿的情况完全不同。

detailed_translations.english: not like something or someone else, or not like before

sentences.english: They moved to a new house some time ago (=  a fairly long time ago  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们搬进新居已有些日子了。

sentences.english: We had our bicentenary celebrations not that long ago.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，我们举行了200周年庆典活动。

detailed_translations.english: used to show how far back in the past something happened

sentences.english: Being a good interviewer, however, requires much preparation and skill.
sentences.chinese: 不过，好的采访者需要许多准备和技巧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 采访者；会见者；面谈者；进行面试者
detailed_translations.english: the person who asks the questions in an interview

sentences.english: Is there enough room for me?
sentences.chinese: 有足够的地方给我吗？

sentences.english: We didn't leave early enough.
sentences.chinese: 我们离开得不够早。

detailed_translations.english: used before plural or uncountable nouns to mean ‘as many or as much as sb needs or wants ’
to the necessary degree

sentences.english: Lucy turned on the television to watch the evening news.
sentences.chinese: 露西打开电视收看晚间新闻。

sentences.english: They have a television in every room.
sentences.chinese: 他们每个房间都配有电视。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electronic equipment shaped like a box with a screen, on which you can watch programmes

sentences.english: I find it hard to cope with change.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.english: scientists worried about climatic change
sentences.chinese: 为气候变化感到担忧的科学家们

sentences.english: A change in personality may mean your teenager has a drug problem.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子如果性格上发生了变化，可能意味着有吸毒问题。

sentences.english: No major changes were made to the book.
sentences.chinese: 这本书没有大的修改。

sentences.english: She had a change of heart (= change in attitude ) and decided to stay.
sentences.chinese: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.english: Family life has undergone dramatic change in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: Matt emptied the loose change from his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process or result of something or someone becoming different

sentences.english: It was a cold moonlit night.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒冷的月夜。

sentences.english: I didn’t sleep too well last night.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚睡得不太好。

detailed_translations.english: the dark part of each 24-hour period when the sun cannot be seen and when most people sleep

sentences.english: There isn’t a lot of work at this time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候工作机会都不多。

sentences.english: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.
sentences.chinese: 他失业有两年了。

sentences.english: More people are in work (= have a job ) than ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money

detailed_translations.chinese: 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进
detailed_translations.english: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job

sentences.english: a view of green fields and rolling hills
sentences.chinese: 田野青翠、丘陵起伏的景色

sentences.english: Fans cheered as the players took the field (= went onto the field ) .
sentences.chinese: 球员上场时球迷们欢呼起来。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land in the country, especially one where crops are grown or animals feed on grass

sentences.english: The warehouse was completely destroyed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 仓库全给烧毁了。

sentences.english: Thirty people died in a fire in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 30人死于芝加哥市中心的一场火灾。

sentences.english: Police think that the fire was started deliberately.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为有人故意纵火。

sentences.english: Rioters set fire to a whole row of stores (= made them start burning ) .
sentences.chinese: 暴徒纵火焚烧了一整排商店。

sentences.english: Soldiers fired on the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 士兵朝人群开枪。

detailed_translations.english: uncontrolled flames, light, and heat that destroy and damage things
to shoot bullets or bombs

name: or
trans: adv.（用于否定句中，也不，也没

sentences.english: Shall we go out to the cinema or stay at home?
sentences.chinese: 我们是出去看电影还是待在家里？

sentences.english: You can have ham, cheese, or tuna.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择火腿、干酪或者金枪鱼。

sentences.english: She wasn’t involved in drugs or anything like that.
sentences.chinese: 她没有涉毒之类的行为。

sentences.english: Grapes are usually either green or red.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄一般要么是绿色，要么是红色。

sentences.english: He’s going to do it whether we like it or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们喜欢与否，他都会去做这件事。

sentences.english: It’s going to snow tomorrow, or that’s what the forecast says.
sentences.chinese: 明天要下雪，确切地说，气象预报是这样说的。

detailed_translations.english: used between two words or phrases to show that either of two things is possible, or used before the last in a list of possibilities or choices

sentences.english: We’ve lost radio contact with the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我们和这架飞机失去了无线电联络。

sentences.english: I sat down and turned on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我坐下来打开收音机。

detailed_translations.english: when messages are sent or received in this way

sentences.english: The telephone rang just as I was leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我正要走，电话铃响了。

detailed_translations.english: the system of communication that you use to have a conversation with someone in another place
to talk to someone by telephone

sentences.english: I wrote her several letters , but she didn’t reply.
sentences.chinese: 我给她写了几封信，可是她没有回复。

detailed_translations.english: to put words in a letter to someone

sentences.english: I do hope everything goes well.
sentences.chinese: 我真心希望一切顺利。

sentences.english: It was hoped that the job would be filled by a local person.
sentences.chinese: 希望该职位由当地人来担任。

sentences.english: Let’s just hope someone finds her bag.
sentences.chinese: 希望有人找到她的提包。

sentences.english: I hope to God I haven’t left the car window open.
sentences.chinese: 但愿我没有忘记关车窗。

sentences.english: When I first arrived in New York, I was full of hope for the future.
sentences.chinese: 我初到纽约时，对未来充满希望。

detailed_translations.english: to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely
a feeling of wanting something to happen or be true and believing that it is possible or likely

sentences.english: How many languages do you speak?
sentences.chinese: 你能说几种语言？

sentences.english: one of the best-known poems in the English language
sentences.chinese: 最著名的英语诗歌之一

detailed_translations.english: a system of communication by written or spoken words, which is used by the people of a particular country or area

sentences.english: The dancer’s technique is strong.
sentences.chinese: 这个舞蹈演员舞技精湛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 舞蹈家；舞蹈演员；舞女；跳舞者
detailed_translations.english: someone who dances as a profession

sentences.english: foreign students
sentences.chinese: 外国学生

sentences.english: Can you speak any foreign languages?
sentences.chinese: 你会讲外语吗？

detailed_translations.english: from or relating to a country that is not your own

sentences.english: She spoke with studied politeness.
sentences.chinese: 她说话的时候故意装得很客气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 深思熟虑的； 认真习得的

sentences.english: a hard wooden chair
sentences.chinese: 一把硬木椅

sentences.english: the hardest substance known to man
sentences.chinese: 已知的最硬物质

sentences.english: After months without rain, the ground was too hard to plough.
sentences.chinese: 数月无雨，土地坚硬难犁。

sentences.english: This year’s exam was much harder than last year’s.
sentences.chinese: 今年的考试比去年的难得多。

detailed_translations.english: firm, stiff, and difficult to press down, break, or cut

sentences.english: A hamburger and a coke.
sentences.chinese: 一个汉堡和一杯可乐。

sentences.english: Then have a hamburger.
sentences.chinese: 那么吃一个汉堡吧。

sentences.english: I order a soda and a hamburger for myself. Then another person gets coffee for me.
sentences.chinese: 嗯， 我为自己点了一杯苏打和一个汉堡包， 然后另外一人给我拿了杯咖啡。

detailed_translations.english: a flat round piece of finely cut beef(= meat from a cow ) which is cooked and eaten in a bread bun

sentences.english: Do you speak English?
sentences.chinese: 你会说英语吗？

sentences.english: leaflets written in plain English
sentences.chinese: 用简单英语写的传单

sentences.english: the English countryside
sentences.chinese: 英格兰乡村

detailed_translations.english: the language used in Britain, the US, Australia, and some other countries
relating to England or its people

sentences.english: We had bacon and eggs for breakfast .
sentences.chinese: 我们早餐吃了熏肉鸡蛋。

sentences.english: I never eat breakfast .
sentences.chinese: 我从来不吃早饭。

sentences.english: After a hearty breakfast (=  large breakfast  ) , we set out for a hike.
sentences.chinese: 我们吃了一顿丰盛的早餐，然后出发去远足了。

sentences.english: a light breakfast
sentences.chinese: 简单的早餐

sentences.english: a working breakfast
sentences.chinese: 工作早餐

detailed_translations.english: the meal you have in the morning

sentences.english: What’s for lunch?
sentences.chinese: 午饭吃什么？

detailed_translations.english: a meal eaten in the middle of the day

sentences.english: Carefully split the sponge ring, then sandwich the two halves together with whipped cream.
sentences.chinese: 小心地切开海绵蛋糕圈，然后在两半中间夹上生奶油。

detailed_translations.chinese: 夹入；挤进；把做成三明治
detailed_translations.english: If you sandwich two things together with something else, you put that other thing between them. If you sandwich one thing between two other things, you put it between them.
two pieces of bread with cheese, meat, cooked egg etc between them

sentences.english: Get some fish and chips on your way home.
sentences.chinese: 回家路上顺道买些炸鱼加薯条。

sentences.english: a fish and chip shop
sentences.chinese: 炸鱼薯条店

detailed_translations.english: a meal consisting of fish covered with  batter (= a mixture of flour and milk )  and cooked in oil, served with long thin pieces of potato also cooked in oil

sentences.english: traditional Italian cooking
sentences.chinese: 传统的意大利烹饪

sentences.english: a traditional Irish folk song
sentences.chinese: 传统的爱尔兰民歌

sentences.english: a traditional method of brewing beer
sentences.chinese: 传统的啤酒酿造方法

detailed_translations.english: being part of the traditions of a country or group of people

sentences.english: a serving dish
sentences.chinese: 上菜用的盘子

sentences.english: an ovenproof dish
sentences.chinese: 耐热盘

sentences.english: The menu includes a wide selection of vegetarian dishes.
sentences.chinese: 菜单上有品种丰富的素食。

detailed_translations.english: a flat container with low sides, for serving food from or cooking food in

sentences.english: I think I’ll go to bed early tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我想今晚我会早点上床睡觉。

sentences.english: We’re meeting him at 9 o’clock tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我们今晚9点和他见面。

detailed_translations.english: during the night of this day
the night of this day

sentences.english: a public library
sentences.chinese: 公共图书馆

sentences.english: a library book
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的书

sentences.english: My thanks go to the British School of Osteopathy, for the use of their library.
sentences.chinese: 感谢不列颠骨疗法学校允许我使用他们的藏书。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building containing books that can be looked at or borrowed

sentences.english: The student trotted out his knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生炫耀他的知识。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.english: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is studying at a university, school etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 光盘，激光唱片（Compact Disc）；呼叫设备（Calling Device）；中央地区（Central District）；商务部（Commerce Department）

sentences.english: You should talk to Ken – he's always full of good ideas.
sentences.chinese: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。

sentences.english: I knew it was a bad idea to leave him on his own.
sentences.chinese: 我知道把他独自留下不是个好主意。

sentences.english: It was my wife’s idea to move house.
sentences.chinese: 要搬家是我妻子的主意。

sentences.english: He has some very strange ideas about education.
sentences.chinese: 他对教育有些非常奇怪的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or suggestion for a possible course of action, especially one that you think of suddenly

sentences.english: He put the coffee on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他把咖啡放在桌上。

sentences.english: Where did you put the programmes?
sentences.chinese: 你把节目单放在哪里了？

detailed_translations.english: to move something to a particular place or position, especially using your hands

sentences.english: shelves of books
sentences.chinese: 一层层书架的书

sentences.english: supermarket shelves
sentences.chinese: 超级市场的货架

sentences.english: the amount of shelf space available
sentences.chinese: 可用的货架空间

detailed_translations.english: a long flat narrow board attached to a wall or in a frame or cupboard, used for putting things on

sentences.english: The wardrobe was too heavy for me to move on my own.
sentences.chinese: 衣橱太重，我一个人移不动。

sentences.english: a heavy suitcase
sentences.chinese: 沉重的手提箱

sentences.english: The males are seven times heavier than the females.
sentences.chinese: 雄性的重量是雌性的七倍。

sentences.english: Heavy rain has caused flooding in many areas.
sentences.chinese: 大雨在很多地区造成水灾。

sentences.english: The apple trees were heavy with fruit.
sentences.chinese: 苹果树上果实累累。

detailed_translations.english: weighing a lot

sentences.english: a German-English dictionary
sentences.chinese: 一本德英词典

detailed_translations.english: a book that gives a list of words in alphabetical order and explains their meanings in the same language, or another language

sentences.english: Employees must show their identity cards at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 雇员在大门口必须出示自己的身份卡。

sentences.english: I haven’t got my membership card yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还没拿到会员卡。

sentences.english: a piece of card
sentences.chinese: 一张卡片纸

sentences.english: My name’s Adam Carver. Here’s my card.
sentences.chinese: 我叫亚当•卡弗，这是我的名片。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of plastic or paper containing information about a person or showing, for example, that they belong to a particular organization, club etc

sentences.english: ‘What’s your name?’ she asked.
sentences.chinese: “你叫什么名字？”她问道 。

sentences.english: Don’t ask him – he won’t know.
sentences.chinese: 别问他，他不知道。

sentences.english: That kid’s always asking awkward questions.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子总是问一些尴尬的问题。

sentences.english: Let’s ask them to have dinner with us some time.
sentences.chinese: 哪天我们请他们一起吃晚餐。

sentences.english: You have no right to ask anything of me.
sentences.chinese: 你没有权利对我提任何要求。

sentences.english: Jerry’s too scared to ask her out.
sentences.chinese: 杰里没有勇气邀她出去。

detailed_translations.english: to speak or write to someone in order to get an answer, information, or a solution

sentences.english: You’ve spelt my name wrong.
sentences.chinese: 你把我的名字拼错了。

sentences.english: What? Have I done it wrong ?
sentences.chinese: 什么？我做得不对吗？

sentences.english: I asked him to sort those files, but he’s done it all wrong (= in completely the wrong way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我让他整理这些文件，可是他弄得根本不对。

sentences.english: I must have added it up wrong, then.
sentences.chinese: 那我一定是加错了。

sentences.english: It looks like it's spelled wrong.
sentences.chinese: 看起来像是拼错了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地
detailed_translations.english: not in the correct way
behaviour that is not morally right

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误的；失常的；不适当的
detailed_translations.english: not correct, and not based on true facts
Wrong is also an adverb

sentences.english: Dear Sir or Madam, ...
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的先生或女士，…

sentences.english: Dear Mrs. Wilson, ...
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的威尔逊夫人，…

sentences.english: Dear Meg, ...
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的梅格，…

sentences.english: You're a lot like me, dear.
sentences.chinese: 你和我太像了，亲爱的。

detailed_translations.english: used before someone’s name or title to begin a letter
You can call someone dear as a sign of affection

sentences.english: I need more information.
sentences.chinese: 我需要更多信息。

detailed_translations.english: facts or details that tell you something about a situation, person, event etc

sentences.english: The project aims to provide an analysis of children’s emotions.
sentences.chinese: 该计划旨在对儿童情绪作出分析。

sentences.english: a three-year research project
sentences.chinese: 一项为期三年的研究计划

sentences.english: The scheme will now be extended after a successful pilot project (= a small trial to test if an idea will be successful ) .
sentences.chinese: 试行成功后，该方案现在将得到推广。

sentences.english: The project is funded by Wellcome plc.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目由威康公司资助。

sentences.english: a project manager
sentences.chinese: 项目经理

sentences.english: a geography project
sentences.chinese: 一个地理课题

detailed_translations.english: a carefully planned piece of work to get information about something, to build something, to improve something etc

sentences.english: a tour guide
sentences.chinese: 导游

sentences.english: an experienced mountain guide
sentences.chinese: 一位有经验的登山向导

sentences.english: We were guided around the museums.
sentences.chinese: 我们在导游的带领下参观了博物馆。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to take tourists to a place and show them around
to show sb the way to a place, often by going with them

sentences.english: Have you seen any good films recently?
sentences.chinese: 你最近看过什么好的影片吗？

sentences.english: I shot five rolls of film on vacation.
sentences.chinese: 我在度假时拍了五卷胶卷。

sentences.english: a film of oil on the surface of the water
sentences.chinese: 水面上的一层油

detailed_translations.english: a story that is told using sound and moving pictures, shown at a cinema or on television

sentences.english: She can play tennis as well as basketball.
sentences.chinese: 她也会打篮球，也会打网球。

detailed_translations.english: in addition to sb/sth; too

sentences.english: My family was in a bad way financially.
sentences.chinese: 我家当时经济窘迫。

sentences.english: The chicken’s nice and crispy – just the way I like it.
sentences.chinese: 这鸡肉很脆，正是我喜欢的口味。

sentences.english: It’s worth thinking how you can improve the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 你应该想想如何让现状变得更好。

detailed_translations.english: a particular state or condition

sentences.english: I wanted to punch him on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 我真想一拳打到他鼻子上。

sentences.english: Matt kissed her on the cheek.
sentences.chinese: 马特亲吻了她的脸颊。

detailed_translations.english: used to say what part of someone or something is hit or touched

sentences.english: The environment is a popular topic these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今环境是一个热门话题。

sentences.english: The main topic for discussion will be the proposed new supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 讨论的主要议题是拟建中的超级市场。

sentences.english: a wide range of topics
sentences.chinese: 广泛的话题

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目， 论题， 话题
detailed_translations.english: a subject that people talk or write about

sentences.english: You can carry this bag – it’s fairly light.
sentences.chinese: 你可以拿这个袋子——它很轻。

sentences.english: You should wear light, comfortable shoes.
sentences.chinese: 你应该穿轻便舒适的鞋子。

sentences.english: The truck was quite light and easy to drive.
sentences.chinese: 这辆卡车很轻，容易驾驶。

sentences.english: people who have suffered only light exposure to radiation
sentences.chinese: 只受到轻度辐射的人

detailed_translations.english: not very heavy

sentences.english: a hard wooden chair
sentences.chinese: 一把硬木椅

sentences.english: the hardest substance known to man
sentences.chinese: 已知的最硬物质

sentences.english: After months without rain, the ground was too hard to plough.
sentences.chinese: 数月无雨，土地坚硬难犁。

sentences.english: This year’s exam was much harder than last year’s.
sentences.chinese: 今年的考试比去年的难得多。

detailed_translations.english: firm, stiff, and difficult to press down, break, or cut

sentences.english: Mind the broken glass.
sentences.chinese: 当心碎玻璃。

sentences.english: a badly broken leg
sentences.chinese: 严重骨折的腿

sentences.english: Gibbs had an X-ray, which revealed no broken bones.
sentences.chinese: 吉布斯拍了X光片，显示没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: in small pieces because it has been hit, dropped etc

sentences.english: Luke came in with his hands in his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 卢克走了进来，双手插在口袋里。

sentences.english: The policeman told me to turn out my pockets (= take everything out of them ) .
sentences.chinese: 警察让我把口袋里的东西都掏出来。

sentences.english: a pocket dictionary
sentences.chinese: 袖珍词典

detailed_translations.english: a type of small bag in or on a coat, trousers etc that you can put money, keys etc in
small enough to be carried in your pocket

sentences.english: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 开始下雨了，所以特里西娅停下来撑起雨伞。

sentences.english: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
sentences.chinese: 那天我就在海滩上度过，躺在海滩遮阳伞下面看书。

detailed_translations.chinese: 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构
detailed_translations.english: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth.

sentences.english: Shall I take the wheel (= drive instead of someone else )?
sentences.chinese: 我来开车好吗？

detailed_translations.english: one of the round things under a car, bus, bicycle etc that turns when it moves

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动；使变换方向；给…装轮子
detailed_translations.english: to push something that has wheels somewhere

sentences.english: The test was easy.
sentences.chinese: 考试很容易。

sentences.english: Finishing the task will not be easy.
sentences.chinese: 完成这项任务并不容易。

sentences.english: There must be an easier way to do that.
sentences.chinese: 一定有更容易的方法去做那件事。

sentences.english: instructions that are easy to follow
sentences.chinese: 易于掌握的使用说明

sentences.english: It would have been easy for the team to lose the game.
sentences.chinese: 球队本来是很容易会输掉这场比赛的。

sentences.english: Having you here does make things a lot easier for me.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，有你在这里事情的确好办多了。

sentences.english: On the whole, Dad has had an easy life.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之，爸爸过着安逸舒适的生活。

sentences.english: You can have an easy time of it now that the kids have all left home.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们都离开了家，你日子可以过得轻松了。

detailed_translations.english: not difficult to do, and not needing much effort

sentences.english: Will you take the job?
sentences.chinese: 你接受这份工作吗？

sentences.english: Do you take American Express?
sentences.chinese: 你们接受美国运通信用卡吗？

sentences.english: If you take my advice , you’ll see a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 如果你听我的意见，就去看医生。

sentences.english: Our helpline take s 3.5 million calls (= telephone calls ) a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们的求助热线每年接听350万个电话。

sentences.english: Some doctors are unwilling to take new patients without a referral.
sentences.chinese: 有些医生不愿意接收没有转诊单的新病人。

sentences.english: Liz found his criticisms hard to take .
sentences.chinese: 利兹觉得他的批评很难接受。

sentences.english: I just can’t take any more (= can’t deal with a bad situation any longer ) .
sentences.chinese: 我再也受不了了。

sentences.english: Staff have agreed to take a 2% pay cut.
sentences.chinese: 员工同意接受2%的降薪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拿走； 接受， 接纳
detailed_translations.english: to accept or choose something that is offered, suggested, or given to you

sentences.english: Do you think the music’s too loud?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得音乐太响了吗？

sentences.english: You’ve put too much salt in the soup.
sentences.chinese: 你往汤里放盐太多。

sentences.english: There are too many cars on the road.
sentences.chinese: 路上车辆太多。

detailed_translations.english: more than is acceptable or possible

sentences.english: Let’s have a rest and then we’ll try again.
sentences.chinese: 我们休息一下，然后再试。

sentences.english: I tried everything to lose weight with no success.
sentences.chinese: 我试了各种方法减肥，但都没有成功。

sentences.english: I tried and tried (= kept making an effort ) and eventually I was offered a job.
sentences.chinese: 我一次次地尝试，终于有人给了我一份工作。

sentences.english: Try as he might (= as hard as he could ) , he could not get the incident out of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他想尽办法，但脑子里仍摆脱不掉那件事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试图，努力；试验；审判；考验
detailed_translations.english: to take action in order to do something that you may not be able to do
an attempt to do something

name: lovely
trans: adv.美丽的，可爱的，令人愉快的

sentences.english: She had a lovely face.
sentences.chinese: 她有一张漂亮的脸蛋。

sentences.english: What a lovely house!
sentences.chinese: 多么漂亮的房子啊！

sentences.english: You look lovely in that dress.
sentences.chinese: 你穿那条连衣裙很漂亮。

sentences.english: He was a lovely little boy.
sentences.chinese: 他是个可爱的小男孩。

sentences.english: What a lovely day!
sentences.chinese: 多好的天气啊！

sentences.english: Thank you for a lovely evening.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你让我们度过了一个美好的夜晚。

detailed_translations.english: beautiful or attractive

sentences.english: We need to get help quickly!
sentences.chinese: 我们需要马上得到帮助！

sentences.english: It would be a good idea to get professional advice.
sentences.chinese: 征求专业人士的意见，这个主意很好。

sentences.english: You may be able to get a grant from the local authority.
sentences.chinese: 你也许可以从当地政府获得拨款。

sentences.english: He cleared his throat to get our attention.
sentences.chinese: 他清清嗓子来引起我们的注意。

sentences.english: What time will we get there?
sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候可以到那里？

sentences.english: We got to Paris that evening.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我们到了巴黎。

sentences.english: She soon got bored with the job.
sentences.chinese: 她不久就厌倦了这份工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 获得，得到；到达；变成，成为
detailed_translations.english: to obtain something by finding it, asking for it, or paying for it

sentences.english: The route then heads west over Gerrick Moor.
sentences.chinese: 之后这条路折向西，穿过格里克漠泽。

sentences.english: the west door of the church
sentences.chinese: 教堂的西门

sentences.english: A damp wind blew from the west.
sentences.chinese: 从西面吹来一股潮湿的风。

sentences.english: a west-facing window
sentences.chinese: 朝西的窗户

detailed_translations.english: towards the west
in the west or facing the west
the direction towards which the sun goes down, and which is on the left if you are facing north

sentences.english: Children under 14 should be accompanied by a parent.
sentences.chinese: 14 岁以下儿童须由一位家长陪同。

sentences.english: The eggs are guarded by both parents.
sentences.chinese: 那些蛋由两只亲鸟共同守护着。

sentences.english: Melissa’s spending the weekend at her parents’ house.
sentences.chinese: 梅利莎正在父母家度周末。

detailed_translations.english: the father or mother of a person or animal

sentences.english: They stayed all afternoon chatting.
sentences.chinese: 他们待了整个下午聊天。

sentences.english: She stayed late to finish the report.
sentences.chinese: 为了完成报告，她工作到很晚。

detailed_translations.english: to remain in a place rather than leave
a limited time of living in a place

sentences.english: In July 1969, Neil Armstrong walked on the moon.
sentences.chinese: 1969年7月，尼尔·阿姆斯特朗踏上了月球。

detailed_translations.english: July is the seventh month of the year in the Western calendar

sentences.english: Which way is south?
sentences.chinese: 哪面是南？

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is at the bottom of a map of the world, below the Equator. It is on the right if you are facing the rising sun.
towards the south
in the south, or facing the south

sentences.english: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.english: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

sentences.english: He spent two and a half weeks with us in June 1986.
sentences.chinese: 1986年6月，他和我们呆了两个半星期。

sentences.english: I am moving out on June 5th.
sentences.chinese: 我将于6月5日搬出去。

detailed_translations.english: June is the sixth month of the year in the Western calendar

sentences.english: Which way is east?
sentences.chinese: 哪边是东？

sentences.english: housing problems in the east
sentences.chinese: 东部的住房问题

sentences.english: The drug is being used all the time out east.
sentences.chinese: 这药一直在东方使用。

detailed_translations.english: the direction from which the sun rises, and which is on the right if you are facing north
to or in the countries in Asia, especially China and Japan

sentences.english: He won the best actor award.
sentences.chinese: 他获得最佳男演员奖。

sentences.english: What’s the best way to cook this fish?
sentences.chinese: 这鱼怎么烧最好？

sentences.english: The best thing to do is to stop worrying.
sentences.chinese: 最好的办法就是不要再担心。

sentences.english: Our pilots are given the best possible training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞行员接受最好的训练。

sentences.english: We use only the very best ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 我们只用最好的原料。

detailed_translations.english: better than anything else or anyone else in quality, skill, how effective it is etc

sentences.english: Which way is north?
sentences.chinese: 哪边是北？

sentences.english: He lives in North Wales.
sentences.chinese: 他住在威尔士北部。

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is at the top of a map of the world, above the Equator. It is on the left if you are facing the rising sun
in the north or facing the north

sentences.english: If you’re tired, we’ll stop and rest for a while.
sentences.chinese: 如果你累了，我们就停下来歇一会儿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使休息，使轻松；把…寄托于
detailed_translations.english: to stop working or doing an activity for a time and sit down or lie down to relax

detailed_translations.chinese: 休息，静止；休息时间；剩余部分；支架
detailed_translations.english: a period of time when you are not doing anything tiring and you can relax or sleep

sentences.english: His mother rode him on her back.
sentences.chinese: 他的母亲让他骑在她的背上。

sentences.english: He rode his son on his shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 他让儿子骑在他的肩上。

sentences.english: They rode over to see us last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期他们骑马来探望我们。

sentences.english: I do most of my studying in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 我学习大都在晚上。

sentences.english: I’m usually out on Friday evenings.
sentences.chinese: 周五晚上我通常都不在家。

sentences.english: What are you doing tomorrow evening?
sentences.chinese: 明天晚上你打算做什么？

sentences.english: Peter left yesterday evening.
sentences.chinese: 彼得昨天晚上走了。

sentences.english: I’ll see you this evening.
sentences.chinese: 我今晚和你见面。

sentences.english: It was early evening by the time we got home.
sentences.chinese: 我们到家时已经是傍晚了。

sentences.english: We had just finished our evening meal when the doorbell rang.
sentences.chinese: 我们刚吃完晚饭门铃就响了。

sentences.english: a broadcast on the evening news
sentences.chinese: 晚间新闻广播

detailed_translations.english: the early part of the night between the end of the day and the time you go to bed

name: late
trans: adv.近日暮的；近深夜的；时间不早的

sentences.english: Sorry I’m late – I overslept.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，来晚了——我睡过头了。

sentences.english: The train was even later than usual.
sentences.chinese: 火车到得甚至比平时还晚。

sentences.english: We apologize for the late departure of flight AZ709.
sentences.chinese: 我们为AZ709航班延误起飞表示歉意。

sentences.english: There are penalties if loan repayments are late.
sentences.chinese: 逾期偿还贷款会被处以罚金。

sentences.english: The stores are open later on Thursdays.
sentences.chinese: 商店星期四开门较晚。

detailed_translations.english: arriving, happening, or done after the time that was expected, agreed, or arranged
after the usual time

sentences.english: the workers’ revolution
sentences.chinese: 工人阶级革命

detailed_translations.english: the members of the  working class

sentences.english: a car factory
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造厂

sentences.english: factory workers
sentences.chinese: 工厂工人

detailed_translations.english: a building or group of buildings in which goods are produced in large quantities, using machines

sentences.english: We arrived early.
sentences.chinese: 我们提早到了。

sentences.english: They must have come home early.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定提早回到家了。

sentences.english: the early morning sunshine
sentences.chinese: 清晨的阳光

detailed_translations.english: before the usual, arranged, or expected time
in the first part of a period of time, event, or process

sentences.english: The plane taxied to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 飞机滑行一段距离后停下来。

detailed_translations.english: if a plane taxis, it moves along the ground before taking off or after landing
a car and driver that you pay to take you somewhere

sentences.english: It’s about a page and a quarter.
sentences.chinese: 大概是一又四分之一页。

sentences.english: Cut the cake into quarters.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋糕切成四等份。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you in a quarter of an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们一刻钟之后见。

detailed_translations.english: one of four equal parts into which something can be divided

sentences.english: The wind blew the door to.
sentences.chinese: 风把门吹上了。

detailed_translations.english: if a door is pushed to, it closes or almost closes

detailed_translations.chinese: 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向
detailed_translations.english: used to say where someone or something goes

detailed_translations.chinese: (To)人名；(柬)多；(中)脱(普通话·威妥玛)

sentences.english: He’s been a constant source of worry .
sentences.chinese: 他总是让人担心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being anxious about something
to be anxious or unhappy about someone or something, so that you think about them a lot

sentences.english: I’ll get you a piece of paper so you can write the number down.
sentences.chinese: 我给你找张纸，你好把号码写下来。

sentences.english: Do you have a pen and paper?
sentences.chinese: 你有笔和纸吗？

sentences.english: the 1998 White Paper on political reform
sentences.chinese: 1998年政治改革白皮书

sentences.english: a paper on the Civil War
sentences.chinese: 一篇关于南北战争的论文

detailed_translations.english: material in the form of thin sheets that is used for writing on, wrapping things etc

sentences.english: Do you fancy going out for a Chinese?
sentences.chinese: 你想不想出去吃顿中餐？

detailed_translations.english: relating to China, its people, or its language
people from China

sentences.english: The troops will not advance until ordered to do so .
sentences.chinese: 在接到命令之前，部队不会前进。

sentences.english: Did Luke sell them? And, if so , what happened to the money?
sentences.chinese: 卢克把它们卖了吗？如果是这样的话，那钱到哪里去了？

sentences.english: ‘Has he lost a fortune?’ ‘ So they say .’
sentences.chinese: “他输掉了一大笔钱吗？”“他们是这么说的。”

sentences.english: ‘Look – I’ve even cleaned the windows.’ ‘ So I see .’
sentences.chinese: “瞧，我把窗子也擦干净了。”“我看到了。”

sentences.english: Parents can withdraw their child from school if they so wish .
sentences.chinese: 家长要是愿意，可以让孩子退学。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer back to an idea, action, quality, situation etc that has just been mentioned
used to say that someone does something because of the reason just stated

sentences.english: Write an essay of about five hundred words.
sentences.chinese: 写一篇约500字的文章。

sentences.english: What does that word mean?
sentences.chinese: 那个单词是什么意思？

sentences.english: ‘Vater’ is the German word for (= that means ) ‘father’.
sentences.chinese: vater在德语中是“父亲”的意思。

sentences.english: Perhaps ‘lucky’ is not exactly the right word .
sentences.chinese: 也许“幸运”一词还不够贴切。

detailed_translations.chinese: [语] 单词；话语；消息；诺言；命令
detailed_translations.english: a single group of letters that are used together with a particular meaning
to use words that are carefully chosen in order to express something

sentences.english: Do you want me to cut the cake?
sentences.chinese: 要我切蛋糕吗？

sentences.english: They’re introducing CCTV cameras in an attempt to cut street crime in the area.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少该地区的街头犯罪，他们安装了闭路电视摄像机。

sentences.english: You need to cut the amount of fat and sugar in your diet.
sentences.chinese: 你需要减少饮食中脂肪和糖的摄入量。

sentences.english: Scientists are warning that unless carbon emissions are cut, we could be heading for an environmental catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 科学家警告说如果不减少碳排放量，我们可能会面临环境灾难。

sentences.english: Seven hundred jobs will be lost in order to cut costs and boost profits.
sentences.chinese: 为了降低成本，提高利润，将削减700个职位。

sentences.english: The major aviation companies need to cut prices if they are to compete with budget airlines.
sentences.chinese: 大航空公司如果想和廉价的航空公司竞争，就需要降低价格。

sentences.english: Staffing levels had already been cut to the bone (= reduced to the lowest level possible ) .
sentences.chinese: 人员配备已经削减到了最低限度。

detailed_translations.english: to divide something or separate something from its main part, using scissors, a knife etc

sentences.english: Cut off a piece of wood 5 cm in length.
sentences.chinese: 截下一段五厘米长的木头。

sentences.english: His trousers were held up with a piece of string.
sentences.chinese: 他的裤子靠一根细绳系着。

sentences.english: Would you like a small or a large piece?
sentences.chinese: 你想要一小块还是一大块？

sentences.english: Chop the potato into bite-sized pieces.
sentences.chinese: 把马铃薯切成小块。

sentences.english: The shower head just came to pieces (= broke into separate parts ) in my hand.
sentences.chinese: 花洒就在我手中裂开了。

sentences.english: to piece together a jigsaw
sentences.chinese: 拼合拼图

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that has been separated from the main part
to put all the separate parts of sth together to make a complete whole

sentences.english: The ceiling needs painting.
sentences.chinese: 天花板需要粉刷了。

sentences.english: brightly paintedhouses
sentences.chinese: 粉刷得很亮丽的房屋

sentences.english: The living room was painted in pastel shades of pink and blue.
sentences.chinese: 起居室被漆成淡雅的粉色和蓝色。

detailed_translations.english: to put paint on a surface
to make a picture, design etc using paint

sentences.english: He put the coffee on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他把咖啡放在桌上。

sentences.english: Where did you put the programmes?
sentences.chinese: 你把节目单放在哪里了？

detailed_translations.english: to move something to a particular place or position, especially using your hands

sentences.english: a pair of drum sticks
sentences.chinese: 一对鼓槌

sentences.english: a measuring stick
sentences.chinese: 量尺

sentences.english: Aunt Lou walks with a stick (= uses a stick to help her walk ) .
sentences.chinese: 卢姑妈走路要拄拐棍。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin piece of wood, plastic etc that you use for a particular purpose
if a pointed object sticks into something, or if you stick it there, it is pushed into it

sentences.english: Her key hung on a string around her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她的钥匙穿了根绳子挂在脖子上。

sentences.english: a ball of string
sentences.chinese: 一团细绳

sentences.english: I need a piece of string to tie this package.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一根绳子来捆这个包裹。

sentences.english: a string of pearls
sentences.chinese: 一串珍珠

detailed_translations.english: a strong thread made of several threads twisted together, used for tying or fastening things

sentences.english: Maria looked at him and laughed.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚看着他大笑起来。

sentences.english: Tony was laughing so hard he had to steady himself on the table.
sentences.chinese: 托尼笑得太厉害了，靠着桌子才能让自己站稳。

sentences.english: Nora laughed so much that she nearly cried.
sentences.chinese: 诺拉笑得眼泪都快出来了。

sentences.english: He couldn’t help it; he burst out laughing (= suddenly started laughing ).
sentences.chinese: 他情不自禁地放声大笑起来。

sentences.english: He’s one of the few writers who can make me laugh out loud.
sentences.chinese: 有几位作家能让我放声大笑，他是其中之一。

sentences.english: He gave a short laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他笑了一声。

detailed_translations.english: to make sounds with your voice, usually while you are smiling, because you think something is funny
the act of laughing or the sound you make when you laugh

sentences.english: I got a letter from Melanie today.
sentences.chinese: 今天我收到梅拉妮的一封信。

sentences.english: There are 26 letters in the English alphabet.
sentences.chinese: 英语字母表有26个字母。

detailed_translations.english: a written or printed message that is usually put in an envelope and sent by mail

sentences.english: an open-air theatre (= a theatre that is outside )
sentences.chinese: 露天剧场

sentences.english: the Mercury Theater
sentences.chinese: 水星剧院

detailed_translations.english: a building or place with a stage where plays and shows are performed

sentences.english: His father was an actor in the Cantonese Opera Company.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲曾是粤剧团的一名演员。

detailed_translations.english: someone who performs in a play or film

sentences.english: I couldn’t go out with someone for a joke, could you?
sentences.chinese: 我可不能拿谈恋爱当儿戏，对不对？

sentences.english: I never joke about money.
sentences.chinese: 我从不拿钱开玩笑。

detailed_translations.english: something that you say or do to make people laugh, especially a funny story or trick
to say things that are intended to be funny and that you do not really mean

sentences.english: After the war many soldiers stayed in France.
sentences.chinese: 战后，许多士兵留在法国。

sentences.english: I go swimming every day after work.
sentences.chinese: 我每天下班后都去游泳。

sentences.english: Do you believe in life after death?
sentences.chinese: 你相信人死后还有来生吗？

sentences.english: The first attack started just after midnight.
sentences.chinese: 刚过午夜，第一波进攻开始了。

sentences.english: David went to bed straight after (=  immediately after  ) supper.
sentences.chinese: 戴维一吃完晚饭就去睡觉了。

sentences.english: After you’d called the police, what did you do?
sentences.chinese: 报警之后，你做了些什么？

sentences.english: Zimmerman changed his name after he left Germany.
sentences.chinese: 齐默尔曼离开德国后改了名字。

sentences.english: People still remember the 1958 revolution and what came after (=  happened after it  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们依然记得1958年的那场革命和之后发生的事。

detailed_translations.english: when a particular event or time has happened, or when someone has done something

sentences.english: Think positively and show some determination.
sentences.chinese: 要往好的方面想，拿出决心来。

sentences.english: She had learned not to show her emotions .
sentences.chinese: 她早就学会了不流露出自己的感情。

sentences.english: It was the sound a man might make when in pain but trying not to show it.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个人强忍着疼痛不愿表露出来时发出的声音。

sentences.english: Mary showed great interest in the children.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽对这些小孩子表示出极大的兴趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 显现， 显露， 露面； 演出， 放映
detailed_translations.english: to let your feelings, attitudes, or personal qualities be clearly seen

detailed_translations.chinese: 表演，节目；演出，上映；展览，展览物，展览会；显示，展示；表面，外观
detailed_translations.english: a performance for the public, especially one that includes singing, dancing, or jokes

detailed_translations.chinese: 给看，显示，出示；引领，带领；教，告知，说明；表明，证明
detailed_translations.english: to let someone see something

sentences.english: He took her out for a five-course dinner in a fancy restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 他带她到一家豪华餐厅吃了一顿有五道菜的晚餐。

sentences.english: The company runs a chain of restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 公司经营连锁饭店。

sentences.english: A new restaurant has just opened across the road.
sentences.chinese: 马路对面刚开了一家新饭馆。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can buy and eat a meal

sentences.english: Come on. Aren’t you ready yet?
sentences.chinese: 快点，你还没准备好吗？

sentences.english: When the doorbell rang he was ready and waiting .
sentences.chinese: 门铃响的时候，他已经准备好在等着了。

sentences.english: Why does it take you so long to get ready to go out?
sentences.chinese: 你外出怎么要准备那么长时间？

sentences.english: He's always ready to help his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他总是乐意帮助朋友。

detailed_translations.english: fully prepared for what you are going to do

sentences.english: Can I borrow your pen for a minute?
sentences.chinese: 我可以借你的笔用一下吗？

sentences.english: They borrowed heavily (=  borrowed a lot of money  ) from the bank to start their new business.
sentences.chinese: 他们向银行贷了巨款来创办新公司。

detailed_translations.english: to use something that belongs to someone else and that you must give back to them later

sentences.english: I can’t read your writing.
sentences.chinese: 我看不懂你写的东西。

sentences.english: She picked up the letter and read it.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起信读了起来。

sentences.english: Read the instructions carefully before you start.
sentences.chinese: 开始前要仔细阅读说明。

sentences.english: children who are just learning to read and write
sentences.chinese: 刚刚开始学习读和写的儿童

sentences.english: Her books are quite widely read (= read by a lot of people ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的书读者很多。

sentences.english: When I was young, I read every one of his books from cover to cover (= read all of something because you are very interested ) .
sentences.chinese: 我小时候，他的每一本书我都从头到尾一页不落地看过。

detailed_translations.english: to look at written words and understand what they mean
to look at written words and understand what they mean

sentences.english: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 碗橱里有一些糖。

sentences.english: My mother was in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲在厨房里。

sentences.english: He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.chinese: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.english: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.english: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 曼森在监狱里待了15年。

sentences.english: a hole in the ground
sentences.chinese: 地上的一个洞

sentences.english: Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.chinese: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.english: My parents live in New Zealand now.
sentences.chinese: 我父母现住在新西兰。

sentences.english: I never went in pubs.
sentences.chinese: 我从不进酒吧。

detailed_translations.english: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is

sentences.english: They must have returned by another route.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定是从另一条路线回来的。

detailed_translations.english: not the same thing, person etc, but a different one

sentences.english: Throughout history the achievements of women have been largely ignored.
sentences.chinese: 从古至今，妇女的成就都被大大地忽视了。

sentences.english: No man in recent history has done more to rebuild the Democratic Party.
sentences.chinese: 他对重建民主党的贡献在近代史上无人能及。

sentences.english: the early history of Scotland
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰的早期历史

sentences.english: Other meteor storms have occurred in recorded history .
sentences.chinese: 在有记载的历史上发生过其他的流星暴。

sentences.english: a museum devoted to local history
sentences.chinese: 专门介绍当地历史的博物馆

sentences.english: one of the darkest episodes in American history
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上最黑暗的事件之一

sentences.english: an interesting period in Egyptian history
sentences.chinese: 埃及历史上一段有趣的时期

sentences.english: a decision that changed the course of history
sentences.chinese: 改变历史进程的决定

sentences.english: a college steeped in history
sentences.chinese: 一所历史悠久的学院

sentences.english: Your doctor will ask for your medical history.
sentences.chinese: 医生会询问你的病历。

detailed_translations.english: all the things that happened in the past, especially the political, social, or economic development of a nation

sentences.english: ‘What’s your name?’ she asked.
sentences.chinese: “你叫什么名字？”她问道 。

sentences.english: Don’t ask him – he won’t know.
sentences.chinese: 别问他，他不知道。

sentences.english: That kid’s always asking awkward questions.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子总是问一些尴尬的问题。

sentences.english: Let’s ask them to have dinner with us some time.
sentences.chinese: 哪天我们请他们一起吃晚餐。

sentences.english: You have no right to ask anything of me.
sentences.chinese: 你没有权利对我提任何要求。

sentences.english: Jerry’s too scared to ask her out.
sentences.chinese: 杰里没有勇气邀她出去。

detailed_translations.english: to speak or write to someone in order to get an answer, information, or a solution

sentences.english: Can I ask you a question?
sentences.chinese: 我能问你个问题吗？

sentences.english: I’m afraid I can’t answer that question.
sentences.chinese: 我恐怕无法回答那个问题。

detailed_translations.english: a sentence, phrase or word that asks for information

sentences.english: I’m sorry, I’ve forgotten your name.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我忘记你的名字了。

sentences.english: I know you told me, but I forgot.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你告诉过我，但是我忘了。

sentences.english: What happened that day will never be forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 那一天的事永远难忘。

sentences.english: He’s someone who never forgets a face (= forgets who someone is ).
sentences.chinese: 他是那种见人一面就不会忘记的人。

detailed_translations.english: to not remember facts, information, or people or things from the past

sentences.english: Did you bring an umbrella?
sentences.chinese: 你带伞了吗？

sentences.english: The senator’s speech brought an angry response from Civil Rights groups.
sentences.chinese: 那名参议员的话引起了一些民权组织的愤怒。

sentences.english: The discovery of gold brought thousands of people to the Transvaal.
sentences.chinese: 黄金的发现把成千上万的人引到了德兰士瓦。

detailed_translations.english: to take something or someone with you to the place where you are now, or to the place you are talking about

sentences.english: It will be dark soon.
sentences.chinese: 天很快就要黑了。

sentences.english: David arrived sooner than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 戴维到得比我预料的快。

sentences.english: ‘Who?’ ‘You’ll find out soon enough (= fairly soon ) .’
sentences.chinese: “谁？”“你很快就会知道的。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 快；不久，一会儿；立刻；宁愿
detailed_translations.english: in a short time from now, or a short time after something else happens

sentences.english: When are we leaving?
sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候走？

sentences.english: When did you first meet Dr Darnall?
sentences.chinese: 你是什么时候认识达纳尔博士的？

sentences.english: When will the work be finished?
sentences.chinese: 这项工作什么时候完成？

sentences.english: I don’t know when I’ll see her again.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道何时才能再见到她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 考虑到；既然；当…时；在…时；如果
什么时候，何时；（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时；其时；当时
detailed_translations.english: at what time

sentences.english: He wore spectacles perched on the very end of his nose.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼镜架在鼻尖上。

sentences.english: The end of the pencil snapped.
sentences.chinese: 铅笔的笔尖啪的一声断了。

sentences.english: Jo joined the end of the line.
sentences.chinese: 乔排到了队尾。

sentences.english: She’ll do anything to achieve her own ends.
sentences.chinese: 她为了实现自己的目标，什么都会去做。

sentences.english: The road ends here.
sentences.chinese: 这条路到此为止。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a place or object that is furthest from its beginning or centre
to finish; to make sth finish

sentences.english: I wish you’d stop looking at me like that. You’re making me nervous.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要再那样看着我了，你让我紧张。

sentences.english: By the time I got into the interview I was a nervous wreck (= was extremely nervous ).
sentences.chinese: 到了面试的时候，我紧张得要命。

detailed_translations.english: worried or frightened about something, and unable to relax

sentences.english: The plane landed at Heathrow Airport.
sentences.chinese: 飞机降落在希思罗机场。

sentences.english: Her family went to see her off at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 她的家人去机场送她。

detailed_translations.english: a place where planes take off and land, with buildings for passengers to wait in

sentences.english: Slow down or you'll get a ticket.
sentences.chinese: 开慢点儿，否则你会接到一张罚款通知单。

sentences.english: parking/speeding ticket
sentences.chinese: 违法停车/超速行驶罚款单

detailed_translations.english: a printed note ordering you to pay money because you have done something illegal while driving or parking your car

sentences.english: I have an Irish passport.
sentences.chinese: 我持爱尔兰护照。

sentences.english: They need to check that your passport is in order.
sentences.chinese: 他们要检查一下你的护照是否有效。

detailed_translations.english: a small official document that you get from your government, that proves who you are, and which you need in order to leave your country and enter other countries

sentences.english: She doesn’t feel safe in the house on her own.
sentences.chinese: 她独自一人在家感到不安全。

sentences.english: Make sure you keep these documents safe .
sentences.chinese: 你一定要妥善保管这些文件。

detailed_translations.english: not in danger of being harmed, lost, or stolen
a strong metal box or cupboard with special locks where you keep money and valuable things

sentences.english: They have two pets – a cat and a dog.
sentences.chinese: 他们有两只宠物，一只猫和一只狗。

sentences.english: We weren’t allowed to keep pets at school.
sentences.chinese: 学校里不许我们养宠物。

sentences.english: Rabbits make good pets .
sentences.chinese: 兔子是很好的宠物。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["pet food"]}
sentences.chinese: 宠物粮食

sentences.english: a pet shop
sentences.chinese: 宠物商店

sentences.english: The policeman reached down and petted the wolfhound.
sentences.chinese: 警察伸出手，摸了摸那条猎狼犬。

detailed_translations.english: an animal such as a cat or a dog which you keep and care for at home
If you pet a person or animal, you touch them in an affectionate way
a plan, idea, or subject that you particularly like or are interested in

sentences.english: I was so shocked I couldn’t speak.
sentences.chinese: 我震惊得说不出话来。

sentences.english: He spoke very softly (= quietly ) .
sentences.chinese: 他说话声音非常轻柔。

detailed_translations.english: to use your voice to produce words

sentences.english: The offices are on the top two floors of the building.
sentences.chinese: 办公室在大楼最高的两层。

sentences.english: a farmhouse and other farm buildings
sentences.chinese: 农舍以及其他的农场建筑

sentences.english: There is a limited supply of land for building.
sentences.chinese: 建筑用地供应有限。

detailed_translations.english: a structure such as a house, church, or factory, that has a roof and walls

name: American
trans: adv.美国的，美国人的，美国人

sentences.english: Her mother is American.
sentences.chinese: 她妈妈是美国人。

sentences.english: a famous American writer
sentences.chinese: 一位著名的美国作家

detailed_translations.english: relating to the US or its people
someone from the US

sentences.english: It makes you want to watch the next episode to find out what's going to happen.
sentences.chinese: 这使你想看下一集，以弄清接下来要发生什么。

sentences.english: I was relieved to find out that my problems were due to a genuine disorder.
sentences.chinese: 查明我的问题的确是失调造成的，我就放心了。

detailed_translations.english: If you find something out, you learn something that you did not already know, especially by making a deliberate effort to do so

sentences.english: I have no more questions.
sentences.chinese: 我没问题了。

sentences.english: The film deserves more attention from the public.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片应受到公众的更多注意。

sentences.english: The accident taught him to be more careful.
sentences.chinese: 这起事故的教训使他变得更小心。

detailed_translations.english: a greater amount or number
having a particular quality to a greater degree
